item.description:
"Greening Your Home and Your Lifestyle"

Have a New Years resolution to be greener in 2010 but not sure where to start? Looking for ways to cut your energy bills or reduce the amount of toxins your kids are exposed to? Get your questions answered here by specialist Gwen Brady. In this interactive discussion we'll review:


*Energy Conservation - simple steps to putting a dent in your electric bill
*Water Conservation/Water Purity
*Toxic Free Living: ways to reduce the chemicals in your home, what's the deal with BPAs and plastics, green cleaning "hype" and more
*Waste Reduction and Recycling: how to make it a habit, what is composting really?
*Indoor Air Quality
*What's a carbon footprint... and why we should care
item.name: Greening Your Home & Lifestyle
